org.forgerock.openam.rest.fluent

Class AuditFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.rest.fluent.AuditFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoliciesAuditFilter

    public class AuditFilter
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
    Filter which will audit any requests that pass through it.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • filterAction

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionResponse,org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException> filterAction(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                                                                                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler next)
        Records an 'access' audit event before and after the filtered CREST resource receives an action request. If the 'before' audit event fails due to an error, the request is cancelled and an error response is returned. If the 'after' audit event fails due to an error, the request is not cancelled as it's affects may have already been applied.
        Specified by:
        filterAction in interface org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter
        Parameters:
        context -
        request -
        next -

      • getCreateSuccessDetail

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getCreateSuccessDetail(org.forgerock.json.resource.CreateRequest request,
                                                           org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceResponse response)
        Provides additional details (e.g. failure description or summary of the payload) relating to an ResourceResponse to a successful CreateRequest. This information is logged in the access audit log. Subclasses can implement this method if they need to return details.
        Parameters:
        request - The CreateRequest instance from which details may be taken. Cannot be null.
        response - The ResourceResponse instance from which details may be taken. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        JsonValue free-form details, or null to indicate no details. The default for no overridden implementation is provided here as null.

      • getReadSuccessDetail

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getReadSuccessDetail(org.forgerock.json.resource.ReadRequest request,
